titles.title: To require that ten percent of the motor vehicles purchased by Executive agencies be hybrid electric vehicles or high-efficiency vehicles.
To require that ten percent of the motor vehicles purchased by Executive agencies be hybrid electric vehicles or high-efficiency vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Requires at least ten percent of the motor vehicles purchased by an Executive agency in any fiscal year to be high-efficiency vehicles (that use fuel other than gasoline or diesel fuel) or hybrid electric vehicles (that have a fuel-efficient gasoline engine assisted by an electric motor).
